meanings.definition: A person or thing that sunders or separates.
meanings.sent1: The sunderers in the story were the ones who divided the land.
meanings.sent2: The sunderers were responsible for breaking the fragile vase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous sunderers decided to split the cake into tiny pieces.
meanings.sent4: The sunderers of friendship tore apart the once close group.
meanings.sent5: The sunderers in the storm scattered the leaves far and wide.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of sunderers walking down the street.
meanings.sent2: The sunderers gathered to discuss their plans for the project.
meanings.sent3: The sunderers formed a line to divide the room in half.
meanings.sent4: The sunderers stood out in the crowd with their unique outfits.
meanings.sent5: The sunderers worked together to split the workload evenly.
